com.openkm.vernum

接口 VersionNumerationAdapter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BranchVersionNumerationAdapter, MajorMinorReleaseVersionNumerationAdapter, MajorMinorVersionNumerationAdapter, PlainVersionNumerationAdapter

    public interface VersionNumerationAdapter
    作者:
    pavila
    另请参阅:
    PlainVersionNumerationAdapter, BranchVersionNumerationAdapter, MajorMinorVersionNumerationAdapter, MajorMinorReleaseVersionNumerationAdapter

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getInitialVersionNumber()
      Obtain the initial version number to be set when creating a new document

      Calculate the next version number from a given one.

    • 字段详细资料

      • qs

        static final java.lang.String qs
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInitialVersionNumber

        java.lang.String getInitialVersionNumber()
        Obtain the initial version number to be set when creating a new document
        返回:
        This first version number.

      • getNextVersionNumber

        java.lang.String getNextVersionNumber(org.hibernate.Session session,
                                    NodeDocument nDoc,
                                    NodeDocumentVersion nDocVer)
        Calculate the next version number from a given one.
        参数:
        session - Hibernate session.
        nDoc - Document which will increase the revision number.
        nDocVer - Current document version node.
        返回:
        The new calculated version numbering.
